{"name": "New Jersey SNAP Self-Application", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/
There are 2 ways to submit snap application
By online https://www.mynjhelps.gov/register
By person open this link to download application form .. https://www.nj.gov/humanservices/njsnap/apply/ways/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.nj.gov/humanservices/njsnap/apply/ways/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(800) 687-9512", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": " If you have a smartphone you’re comfortable using, the easiest way to apply for SNAP is to complete the application online, then upload the required documents on the same website. You can also check your case status there! Here’s the link: https://oneapp.dhs.state.nj.us/default.aspx If you need to get in touch with the office directly, please call 1-800-687-9512 or your County Board of Social Services: https://www.nj.gov/humanservices/njsnap/home/cbss.shtml "}]}
